Name: R. Sampath Raj
Tweet: The success of #JanaAashirwadaYatre is evident from the efforts and smiles of our top leaders and all party workers. @RahulGandhi  ji, @kcvenugopalmp @siddaramaiah ji, @DrParameshwara ji and @DKShivakumar I m sure the people of Karnataka will bless @INCKarnataka again  https://t.co/DTLpEGoL9i
